head.supplied: Botanic Gardens, Melbourne, ¶ 1. November 1853. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you for communication to his Excellency the Governor, that I shall commence this day, according to his Excellencys...

div.p: C53/11056, unit 203, VPRS 1189 inward registered correspondence, VA 856 Colonial Secretary's Office, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you for communication to his Excellency the Governor, that I shall commence this day, according to his Excellencys command, my projected journey for the farther botanical exploration of this province.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor, to be,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: your most obedient and humble servant

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
